sentences.english: Rain and snow don't penalize your Spot and Search checks.
sentences.chinese: 你的侦察和搜寻检定不再因雨和雪受到处罚。

sentences.english: Ji rummages for fake or substandard goods in shops.
sentences.chinese: 纪万昌在商店里搜寻假商品或不合格的商品。

sentences.english: The dog went of and quested.
sentences.chinese: 只狗离去而开始进行跟踪搜寻了。

sentences.english: Rescuers worked after daybreak to try to reach those trapped in the rubble of collapsed buildings.
sentences.chinese: 救援人员拂晓开始搜寻被埋在倒坍建筑物瓦砾中的人。

sentences.english: Part of the crew headed that way in search of the suspect.
sentences.chinese: 部分组员前往那个方向搜寻嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Has used fact-finding techniques and diagnostic tools to identify problems.
sentences.chinese: 使用事件搜寻技术和诊断工具来识别问题。

sentences.english: What we saw was a search without a conclusion, a disappearance without a solution.
sentences.chinese: 我们看到的是一场无果的搜寻，一次无解的失踪。

sentences.english: When I search for him all I see is snow.
sentences.chinese: 我搜寻他，却只看到茫茫白雪。

sentences.english: In the market for a home-made guitar pick or a mini canvas brooch?
sentences.chinese: 你正在搜寻自制吉他拨片或迷你帆布胸针？

sentences.english: Google's natural impulse is to unleash its algorithms on this video content in order to search it.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌的本能是在影片内容上挥洒其演算法以利搜寻。

sentences.english: The search attention ability and higher neural system are relevant.
sentences.chinese: 注意搜寻能力与人的高级神经系统活动的机能有关。

sentences.english: The police are off beam in their search for the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 警察搜寻罪犯时方向错了。

sentences.english: Which had been searching the Barents Sea for weeks, was on its way home.
sentences.chinese: 在巴伦支海搜寻了几个星期之后，正在返航途中。

sentences.english: They range widely in search of carrion.
sentences.chinese: 它们在广阔的区域内搜寻腐肉。

sentences.english: The fetcher also generates a search address for output to the branch target buffer.
sentences.chinese: 指令读取器亦产生搜寻位址输出至分支目标缓冲器中。

sentences.english: I just looked for her everywhere.

definition: to look for/to seek/to find fault
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to search (a place)/to search (a database etc)
to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to investigate a crime/to scout/to reconnoiter/reconnaissance/detection/a scout
to conceal oneself/to go into hiding/to take cover
to cover up/to conceal/to go into hiding
